subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[怪]], [[𡌪]]}} ''(Used as phonetic component)''
* {{l|mul|[[柽]], [[蛏]]}} ''({{w|Simplified Chinese}} characters with {{l|mul|聖}} component simplified to ''<big>圣</big>)
* <font size=4, lang=ja>[[径#Translingual|径]], [[経#Translingual|経]], [[軽#Translingual|軽]], [[茎#Translingual|茎]]</font> ''(Japanese {{w|shinjitai}} characters with {{l|mul|巠}} component simplified to ''<big>圣</big>)
* {{l|mul|[[𠱅]], [[𢫞]], [[𣲾]], [[㹩]], [[𫔽]], [[𦙾]], [[䇈]], [[𫒔]], [[𭭬]], [[壡]], [[𠡍]], [[頚]], [[𫞬]]}}
